name: Green Tea Hydration Heroes with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: Green Tea hydration to the rescue! This set packs all the barrier-boosting, hyaluronic acid-infused skin essentials: cleanser, toner, serum & cream...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Green Tea Water + Encapsulated Hyaluronic Acid (Serum): has higher hydration power than Hyaluronic Acid alone.- Green Tea-derived enzyme (Toner): helps gently exfoliate the skin.- Green Tea Barrier Complex (Cream): hydrates and helps fortify skin's barrier with Squalane + Ceramide..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. This product is also vegan, gluten-free and cruelty free...What Else You Need to Know: Cleanse, hydrate, and boost skinu2019s barrier with fan-fav Green Tea essentials in one easy routine! This set includes a full-size serum & cleanser and deluxe samples of a toner and cream from our iconic Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid line...This Set Contains:.- 5.07 oz/ 150 mL Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Face Cleanser.- 2.70 oz/ 80 mL Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum.- 1.01 oz/ 30 mL Green Tea Enzyme PHA Toner.- 0.67 oz/ 20 mL Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Moisturizer..Clinical Results:.Based on the self-assessment survey portion of a 4-week clinical study on 20 women ages 19 to 40 (Toner):.-  95% agreed they noticed a visible difference in their skin after 1 use...Based on a 1-week independent consumer study on 30 women ages 20-39 (Serum + Cream):.- 96% felt longer-lasting hydration after using together for 1 week..- 96% felt a stronger skin barrier after using together for 1 week...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use this set AM and PM. .-Follow with sunscreen in the AM...Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Face Cleanser:.-Squeeze a pea-size amount onto your palms and create a rich lather..-Gently massage onto a wet face and rinse with lukewarm water...Green Tea Enzyme PHA Toner:.-After cleansing, pour a few drops onto your hands or a cotton pad. .-Sweep over your entire face and neck, avoiding eye and lip areas...Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum:.-After toning, smooth two to three pumps evenly onto your entire face and neck. .-Gently pat in for better absorption. ..Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Moisturizer:.-After applying serum, smooth a dime-size amount onto your face and neck..-Gently pat in for better absorption. ..Recycling Instructions:.-innisfree partners with TerraCycle on a no-waste recycling program to give your empties a second life. .-Gather all your empty products, rinse them out, and then place them in a box..-Log into your TerraCycle account to download and print a free shipping label, then simply drop off the box at your local carrier.

reviews.review_title: A great set of products that work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As winter has set in my skin gets incredibly dry, flaky and irritated. I found this set to be incredibly helpful and have all the main products I needed for skincare.  It has full sized containers of their cleanser and serum and two deluxe samples of their toner and cream. I do wish the cream was one of the full sized products but it's still a good amount of products for a great price. It's vegan and cruelty free which is a definite highlight in my opinion. Each product contains green tea in some form (seed oil, green tea derived toner, and green teat water), in addition to micro encapsulated hyaluronic acid which apparently works better at creating moisture rich and soft skin than normal hyaluronic acid.  This set would make a wonderful introduction into skincare for those just starting out a routine, a gift for Christmas, or just for someone needing soft, smooth, and hydrated skin. I'm only taking off one star for wanting a larger sized cream instead of the cleanser which I use far less of.

I love how it absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling soft, plump, and deeply nourished. The refreshing, natural scent is an added bonusu2014nothing overpowering, just clean and calming. Perfect for a daily routine, this set is ideal for those looking for a simple yet effective way to keep their skin feeling hydrated and healthy all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What is there to love about Innisfree? Well, for starters itu2019s an affordable clean beauty care line thatu2019s cruelty-free and uses sustainable ingredients. Pretty awesome, right? Add to that its specific green tea variant, grown in a mineral-rich environment, and packed with 16 amino acids for major hydration. Theyu2019ll even recycle your empty containers for you. Now do I have your attention?  The Hydration Heroes set is a great way to acquaint yourself with this skincare line since it provides all the basic products youu2019ll need and itu2019s only $39. Itu2019s also fragrance-free, so even those with sensitive skin can use it.  Amino Acid Cleansing Foam: This is the only product of the four that is scented. It has a very mild green tea fragrance thatu2019s quite nice. I like how this cleanser foams when you massage it into the skin. It wipes off easily with a warm damp cloth and leaves feeling clean, soft, and supple.  Enzyme PHA Toner: The toner is unscented with no strong astringent smell and removes any makeup or oils missed when cleaning your face. And itu2019s alcohol-free so it doesnu2019t dry the skin out.  Hyaluronic Serum: This serum has a light, runny consistency. I use three pumps as directed and either pat it on or use gentle upward sweeping strokes to apply to the face, neck, and chest area. It absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky residue.  Hyaluronic Cream: A little of this goes a long way. I apply anywhere from a dime to nickel-sized amount of cream to the face. Itu2019s soft, silky, and glides on easily.  Overall, my skin looks and feels hydrated which reduces the appearance of fine lines. I have had no breakouts associated with any of the products either so theyu2019re a good option for sensitive skin. The natural ingredients work in harmony with my body resulting in a more even skin tone and less redness in the cheek area.

This set provides a lot of hydration without clogging my pores. The cleansing foam is very concentrated and the littlest amount goes a long way. It felt like it was really getting my skin nice and clean, without that stripping feeling. The toner, serum, and cream felt like they were adding and locking in moisture. I struggle with a damaged skin barrier, so Iu2019m always looking for a skin routine to help with barrier repair. Even after a short time, I can tell these products are working great with my skin. This is a great way to try the brand for an excellent value. I love that you have a full 4 step skincare routine provided with this set! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Innisfree Hydration Heroes Set for a week and a half now, and Iu2019m pretty impressed. This set is my introduction to Innisfreeu2019s green tea line, and is the gentlest products I've ever put on my skin. I haven't had a single bad reaction to any of the products so far. The set come with a cleansing foam, PHA toner (mini), hydrating serum, and hydrating cream (mini). Definitely worth it imo. The serum is def going to be a HG for me. It has a runny, watery texture and absorbs nicely into the skin. I like to use it after a shower on damp skin to help lock in that moisture. I used the serum on day 1-3 without the other products and I still noticed a very large difference in my skin's softness and pore size (I have dehydrated oily skin on my T zone).  My second favorite of this line is the cleansing foam. It has a super buttery creamy smoothness after emulsifying and applying to my face. Rinses off without any dryness, squishyness, or itchness! I've been cutting back on actives and cleansers and focusing on hydration, so this was perfect!

The products absorb beautifully without leaving any greasy residue, making them ideal for all skin types. From the nourishing face cream to the soothing serum, every item works in harmony to leave your skin feeling soft, plump, and glowing with health.  Not only does this set provide visible results, but it also feels incredibly luxurious to use, thanks to the refreshing scents and silky application. Whether youu2019re new to Innisfree or a long-time fan, this set is a must-have addition to your skincare routine. Itu2019s a complete hydration solution in one beautifully packaged collection!

reviews.review_text: I recently received the Innisfree Hydration Heroes with Green Tea Set in exchange of my honest reviews and I am very impressed. My skin loves green tea and HA and this is a perfect set for my combination sensitive skin. This set includes 4 products that provide instant hydration and leave my skin feeling refreshed. Firstly, the Innisfree Green Tea Seed HA Serum is a game-changer. It feels very light in the skin and provides intense hydration without any stickiness. Another product is The Green Tea Seed HA Cream which has a rich and creamy texture and provides long-lasting moisture and keeps my skin hydrated throughout the day. The set also includes the Green Tea amino acid foaming cleanser. It cleanses very well without stripping off moisture from skin. Lastly, the Green Tea Balancing enzyme PHA toner is a great addition to my skincare routine. It exfoliates along with providing hydration. It has a soothing formula that doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. Overall, the Innisfree Hydration Heroes with Green Tea Set is an awesome product for anyone looking to amp up their hydration game. The products in this set are effective, gentle, and leave the skin feeling hydrated and oh so soft. I highly recommend this set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Innisfreeusa in exchange for my honest review. I recently incorporated the Innisfree Green Tea Seed Hyaluronic Serum into my daily routine, and the results have been nothing short of impressive. This vegan-certified product, enriched with the revolutionary Green Tea Biome, has quickly become a staple in my skincare regimen. One of the standout features of this serum is its exceptional moisturizing properties. The infusion of hyaluronic acid, coupled with the power of the Green Tea Biome, provides a boost of hydration. This serum goes beyond surface-level moisture, delving deep into the skin to fortify the natural barrier. The result? A visibly plump and nourished complexion that radiates health. What sets this serum apart is its compatibility with various skin types, particularly those prone to acne and sensitivity. As someone who battles occasional breakouts, I was delighted to find a product that not only hydrates but also caters to my skin's specific needs. The serum's lightweight formula ensures it doesn't clog pores, making it a safe bet for those with acne-prone skin. One of the most soothing experiences comes from the application itself. The serum glides effortlessly onto the skin. The serum absorbs very quickly. The non-greasy texture ensures that it doesn't leave any residue, making it an ideal choice for both day and night use.
